ygData.subject: Re: Roll Call
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Best trade secret? did you figure out what the diety sketch was for?? what would it take to get you to share your secret with a dedicated potter/baker?
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: Paul Kundrat <krat@...>
>
> Well, gosh darn!
>
> If my apprentice Sparky is here, then so am I! Master potter and keeper of one of
> the best trade secrets (pottery) in EQ.
> Kelethin is my city of choice to work my art of pottery in and i will be glad to
> help any other aspiring potters out there.
>

Best trade secret? did you figure out what the diety sketch was for?? what
would it take to get you to share your secret with a dedicated
potter/baker?

Nakano K'shynn
Priest of Innoruuk and evil baker
Iron League
